import { Grid } from "@material-ui/core"; const EndowmentDesc = () => { return(

The Endowment

The endowment is a collection of assets owned by the university that are intended to sustain Stanford over the long term. This includes real estate (yes, Stanford owns a hotel!). Its purpose is to sustain university activities over the long term.

Roughly 80% of the endowment is "restricted." These "restricted" funds are designated for specific purposes by the person who donated them (e.g. a professorship, or a scholarship). Restricted funds and the investment returns they generate cannot be used for any other purpose except their designated one. https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwjyrOW4wJz4AhUSm44IHYNpCeQQFnoECAsQAQ&url=https%3A%2F%2Fsmc.stanford.edu%2F&usg=AOvVaw3httRcKctyFtKJeYPh5hNp

Check out the sankey graph below to see the flow of money centered around the student experience. Hover over a section to learn more about it!

); } export default EndowmentDesc;
